overview: Alfredo Ramirez is an seasoned entrepreneur with direct experience in building early-stage companies with a customer-centric approach, Ramirez oversees all of Vyoptaâ€™s operations from strategic direction, product planning and development, customer services to finance.Prior to Vyopta, Alfredo was Vice President of Sales and Marketing at Reddwerks Corporation â€“ an enterprise software Company. He had previously co-founded Vitalz (a venture backed enterprise company acquired by Oracle) and Daman Consulting (provider of enterprise application integration and business intelligence) and held positions at Andersen Consulting (Accenture) and Trilogy Software. Alfredo holds a BS in Electrical and Computer Engineering from The University of Texas at Austin.
